===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# An [[earthly branch]]: [[one]] of the [[twelve]] [[term]]s [[use]]d in [[East Asia]]n [[culture]]s to [[represent]]
## {{lb|zh|historical|_|astronomy}} The ([[approximately]]) [[twelve]] [[year]]s of [[Jupiter]]'s [[orbital]] [[period]], [[form]]ing the [[Chinese]] [[zodiac]] and [[personified]] as [[twelve]] or [[sixty]] [[god]]s [[known]] as [[Tai Sui]].
## {{lb|zh|astrology}} The [[twelve]] [[animal]]s [[represent]]ing the [[Chinese]] [[zodiac]], {{lb|en|particularly}} as a [[birthyear]].
## {{lb|zh|obsolete}} The [[twelve]] [[month]]s of the [[Chinese]] [[lunar]] [[year]].
## {{lb|zh|historical|_|navigation}} The [[twelve]] [[bear]]ings of [[traditional]] [[Chinese]] [[navigation]], [[comprising]] 30° [[division]]s of the [[compass]] [[begin]]ning with [[due]] [[north]].
## {{lb|zh|historical|_|astronomy}} The [[duodecimal]] [[division]]s of the [[Chinese]] [[season]]s, [[begin]]ning with the [[second]] of the [[three]] [[division]]s of [[winter]].
## {{lb|zh|historical|_|chronometry}} The [[duodecimal]] [[division]]s of the [[day]] into "[[Chinese]]" or "[[double]] [[hour]]s", [[begin]]ning with 11 [[pm]].
## {{lb|zh|historical|_|chronometry}} The [[exact]] [[time]] at the [[middle]] of a "[[Chinese]]" or "[[double]] [[hour]]", [[begin]]ning with [[midnight]].
# The [[twelve]] [[earthly branch]]es as a [[whole]].
